message: Bob, I'm offering you this unique product for $15000. It's a fantastic opportunity, and I believe it holds significant value. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13500. It's still a great deal for you, and it allows me to get closer to the value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am comfortable with paying up to $13000 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
